txt.en: The guard caught you stealing the medicine!
'If we cannot work, we are useless to them.'
'We have come so far, only to end up here....'
Some of the Easterlings in Utterby are too sick to get out of the village before the dwarves attack. Find medicine and heal them before it is too late.
Dalish medicine can be found inside Utterby.\n\nYou should find the Dalish medicine.
'Help me put down these dogs, brother!'
Ill refugees can be found inside Utterby.\n\nYou should offer medicine to ill refugees.
No one saw you take the medicine!
You should talk to Tuhâl, who can be found in Utterby.
'Thank you helping my people, [placeholder]. Once all of this is over, we can have another chance at a new life, hopefully without wolves like the Jangovar feeding upon us.'

'Look around, friend. Some of my people are too sick to leave the village. They are in grave danger if this place becomes a battlefield. I know for a fact that the Dale-folk left medicine behind, but the Jangovar are not letting anyone else have access to it! Hmm. If we are careful, we may steal it out from under their noses.'
